user.title: Claude OAuth Setup
user.description:
To connect your Claude account, you'll need to authorize this integration.

**Step 1:** Open this URL in your browser:

{oauth_url}

**Step 2:** Log in to your Anthropic account and click 'Authorize'

**Step 3:** You'll be redirected to a page with an authorization code

Click 'Submit' below when ready to enter the code.

auth.title: Enter Authorization Code
auth.description:
Paste the authorization code from the redirect page.

Note: The code may include a '#' character - you can paste the whole thing.

error.exchange_failed: Failed to exchange code for tokens. Please try again.
